channel.title: How do i make myself an owner?
channel.description:
Alright, i have read answers on this question that i am having trouble with. But none of them are giving me what i need. They say to go to the folder that says "characters" which i do have, and then they say to go to the file you have for your name or something along those lines. I do not have that, can someone tell me how to make it to make myself owner?
Thanks people.

item.title: How do i make myself an owner?
item.dc:creator: @mclovinscape mclovinscape
item.description:
@mclovinscape wrote:

Wrong section
Go into char files find your guy and set your rights to 3, and you can go into client.java and search owner until you see somones name and put yours in

wait yeah its kind of right section i thought i was in tutorials sorry lol, but for server questions put it into rs2 server development/help

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself an owner?
